data.title: Daytime Emmy Award
data.meta_description: The Daytime Emmy Award is an American accolade bestowed by the New Yorkâ€“based National Academy of Television Arts and Sciences in recognition of excellence in American daytime television programming. The first ceremony was held in 1974, expanding what was originally a primetime-themed Emmy...
